item.title: Continously updated crime report draft criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and its accomplices
item.description: Excerpts from Draft Number 27. The content I am currently publishing online comprises only about one tenth of the entirety of Draft Number 27. TABLE OF CONTENTS TLDR; EXECUTIVE SUMMARY Preamble (I) Introduction: This Crime Report is Written Under Duress (I)(A) Witness Tampering and the (Death?) Threats I Have Received (I)(B) The Christian Duty to Report Wrongdoing (I)(C) Key Witness, Analyst, Whistleblower, and Now Whistleblower x 2 (II) How Does the McDonald’s Frauds Scandal Compare to the Volkswagen Emissions Scandal: a Call For Equitable Accountability

item.title: Continously updated communications notified to the SEC, the FBI, etc
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS Communications to the FBI Communications to the SEC Communications to the FBI Communications to the SEC Return to the Table of Contents ↩︎ To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link: https://www.ECTHRwatch.org/timeline/mcdonalds/ This timeline provides a comprehensive overview of the key milestones and developments.

item.title: Continously updated communications with state and local law enforcement in the United States
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS California Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office Florida California Los Angeles (id=“municipality-of-los-angeles”) Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office Email sent to the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office on April 4, 2024, at 21:00 (+0800 China Standard Time) Email replay from the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office on April 4, 2024, at 21:00 (+0800 China Standard Time) Florida Return to the Table of Contents ↩︎ To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
